pages.text: $(bgreen)Starfruit$() went to the dentist the other day and found he has four cavities. Four cavities in one tooth. How does this happen ?$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)150$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(l)range attack$() plant that shoots $(bred)5 stars in 5 directions$() every 1.5 seconds to randomly attack enemy.
$(bpurple)Special :$() He will randomly $(l)change direction$() each shot.$(br)$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() It will shoot $(l)several stars each tick$() which last 5 seconds.
